insert into farm (code, title, logo, picture, phone, mobile, email, address, guide, is_deleted, is_faked, created, created_by, updated, updated_by, wechat, summary) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isFaked,jdbcType=BIT}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update farm set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guide = #{guide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, is_faked = #{isFaked,jdbcType=BIT}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, code, title, logo, picture, phone, mobile, email, address, guide, is_deleted, is_faked, created, created_by, updated, updated_by, wechat, summary from farm where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
